Posts.Content: greeneyeslv wrote: Hello just a short and brief message not really into talking to much at this time but just wanted to say got my results back and its not good when I can talk more I will come back online and share just need to get beyond this initial shock myself before talking to anyone and now have to tell my kids mom has cancer how am i going to do this without loosing it myself.. Im so scared and scared more for them..Take care all and talk soon. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not good greeneyeslv greeneyeslv

Posts.Content: greeneyeslv wrote: Question for all of you how do you get past the shock of just finding you about having breast cancer.. I just feel so numb and have been just sitting around the last few hours listening to sad music thats been making me cry guess im getting it all out sounds silly doesnt it trying to make myself cry but dont know what else to do and or know how else to feel right now guess it will just take its time to get past this news and move on with the treatments which I to am i turn scared to death about how I will get through that as well. Anyone have any kind words of encouragement how did you get through your treatments on the hard/bad days.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: numb greeneyeslv PINKRIBBONANGEL

Posts.Content: Sep 23, 2009 11:40AM greeneyeslv wrote: I am so glad I found this web site thank you so much for your kind words you brought tears to my eyes but happy ones at that knowing IM not in this alone thank you so much ..
Posts.Title: numb greeneyeslv PINKRIBBONANGEL
